title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view and choosing the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, nothing happens. The expected behavior is for the action to add the Javadoc to the selected field. The context menu should either be removed or fixed to properly add the Javadoc.
EB: After selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy view, choose the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu.
SR: The steps to reproduce the issue are as follows: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view.
